description: Returns details about an inference experiment.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the inference experiment to describe.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the inference experiment being described.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the inference experiment.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the inference experiment.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the inference experiment started or will start.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the inference experiment ended or will end.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the inference experiment. The following are the possible statuses for an inference experiment:
Creating - Amazon SageMaker is creating your experiment.
Created - Amazon SageMaker has finished the creation of your experiment and will begin the experiment at the scheduled time.
Updating - When you make changes to your experiment, your experiment shows as updating.
Starting - Amazon SageMaker is beginning your experiment.
Running - Your experiment is in progress.
Stopping - Amazon SageMaker is stopping your experiment.
Completed - Your experiment has completed.
Cancelled - When you conclude your experiment early using the StopInferenceExperiment API, or if any operation fails with an unexpected error, it shows as cancelled.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: The error message or client-specified Reason from the StopInferenceExperiment API, that explains the status of the inference experiment.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the inference experiment.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which you created the inference experiment.

nested_items.name: CompletionTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the inference experiment was completed.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which you last modified the inference experiment.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that Amazon SageMaker can assume to access model artifacts and container images, and manage Amazon SageMaker Inference endpoints for model deployment.

nested_items.name: EndpointMetadata
nested_items.description: The metadata of the endpoint on which the inference experiment ran.

nested_items.name: EndpointName
nested_items.description: The name of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: EndpointConfigName
nested_items.description: The name of the endpoint configuration.

nested_items.name: EndpointStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the endpoint. For possible values of the status of an endpoint, see EndpointSummary.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: If the status of the endpoint is Failed, or the status is InService but update operation fails, this provides the reason why it failed.

nested_items.name: ModelVariants
nested_items.description: An array of ModelVariantConfigSummary objects. There is one for each variant in the inference experiment. Each ModelVariantConfigSummary object in the array describes the infrastructure configuration for deploying the corresponding variant.

nested_items.name: ModelName
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon SageMaker Model entity.

nested_items.name: VariantName
nested_items.description: The name of the variant.

nested_items.name: InfrastructureConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration of the infrastructure that the model has been deployed to.

nested_items.name: InfrastructureType
nested_items.description: The inference option to which to deploy your model. Possible values are the following:
RealTime: Deploy to real-time inference.

nested_items.name: RealTimeInferenceConfig
nested_items.description: The infrastructure configuration for deploying the model to real-time inference.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type the model is deployed to.

nested_items.name: InstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of instances of the type specified by InstanceType.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of deployment for the model variant on the hosted inference endpoint.
Creating - Amazon SageMaker is preparing the model variant on the hosted inference endpoint.
InService - The model variant is running on the hosted inference endpoint.
Updating - Amazon SageMaker is updating the model variant on the hosted inference endpoint.
Deleting - Amazon SageMaker is deleting the model variant on the hosted inference endpoint.
Deleted - The model variant has been deleted on the hosted inference endpoint. This can only happen after stopping the experiment.

nested_items.name: DataStorageConfig
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 location and configuration for storing inference request and response data.

nested_items.name: Destination
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket where the inference request and response data is stored.

nested_items.name: KmsKey
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Key Management Service key that Amazon SageMaker uses to encrypt captured data at rest using Amazon S3 server-side encryption.

nested_items.name: ContentType
nested_items.description: Configuration specifying how to treat different headers. If no headers are specified Amazon SageMaker AI will by default base64 encode when capturing the data.

nested_items.name: CsvContentTypes
nested_items.description: The list of all content type headers that Amazon SageMaker AI will treat as CSV and capture accordingly.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: JsonContentTypes
nested_items.description: The list of all content type headers that SageMaker AI will treat as JSON and capture accordingly.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ShadowModeConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration of ShadowMode inference experiment type, which shows the production variant that takes all the inference requests, and the shadow variant to which Amazon SageMaker replicates a percentage of the inference requests. For the shadow variant it also shows the percentage of requests that Amazon SageMaker replicates.

nested_items.name: SourceModelVariantName
nested_items.description: The name of the production variant, which takes all the inference requests.

nested_items.name: ShadowModelVariants
nested_items.description: List of shadow variant configurations.

nested_items.name: ShadowModelVariantName
nested_items.description: The name of the shadow variant.

nested_items.name: SamplingPercentage
nested_items.description: The percentage of inference requests that Amazon SageMaker replicates from the production variant to the shadow variant.

nested_items.name: KmsKey
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Key Management Service (Amazon Web Services KMS) key that Amazon SageMaker uses to encrypt data on the storage volume attached to the ML compute instance that hosts the endpoint. For more information, see CreateInferenceExperiment.
